allow: Bash(timeout 60 docker-compose run --rm netbox-sync netbox-sync sync all)

Bash(timeout 30 docker-compose run --rm netbox-sync python3 -c "
from netbox_infra_sync.config import AppConfig
from netbox_infra_sync.api.netbox_client import NetBoxClient

config = AppConfig()
client = NetBoxClient(config)

print(''Testing device creation...'')
test_device = {
    ''name'': ''TEST-DEVICE-001'',
    ''device_type'': client.get_or_create_device_type(''Generic'', ''Unknown''),
    ''site'': client.get_or_create_site(''Default''),
    ''device_role'': client.get_or_create_device_role(''Server''),
    ''tags'': [''source:fortigate'']
}

try:
    result = client.create_or_update_device(test_device)
    print(f''Success! Created device: {result[""name""]}'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Error: {e}'')
")
Bash(timeout 60 docker-compose run --rm netbox-sync netbox-sync sync fortigate)
